header.title: Tori Adventure Center
header.subtitle: Memorable canoe trips on the rivers of Pärnu County and archery hunts in nature since 1996.

canoeTrips.title: Canoe Trips
canoeTrips.description: Tori Adventure Center offers memorable canoe trips in the Soomaa region. The canoe trips take place on the Pärnu River, known for its natural beauty and calm waters. The length of the trip can be adjusted according to your preferences. Suitable for groups of two or more people.

bowHunting.title: Bow Hunting
bowHunting.description: Bow hunting takes place in the forest near the adventure center. There are 12 archery tracks set up, each featuring targets depicting various animals and birds. The winner is the archer who collects the most points. Suitable for groups of six or more people.

sauna.title: Saunas
sauna.description: After an active day, you can relax in the hot tub or sauna located by the Pärnu River. The hot tub can accommodate up to 10 people.

prices.title: Prices
prices.description: Discounts depending on the group size and the day of the trip. Inquire about discounts via email or phone. All prices include VAT.

canoe.title: Canoe
canoe.hourTrip: One-hour Trip in Tori: €10 per person
